name: Shopee
description: Shopee is the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. It is a platform tailored for the region, providing customers with an easy, secure and fast online shopping experience through strong payment and logistical support.

name: Lazada
description: Lazada is a company developing an online shopping and selling marketplace. The Company offers products from a number of categories, including consumer electronics, household goods, toys, fashion, sports equipment and groceries.

name: Sendo
description: Sendo is an e-commerce site that offers clothing, homeware, cosmetics, tech accessories, and more.

name: Tiki
description: Tiki is Vietnam’s fastest and most trusted B2C e-commerce platform. Tiki is Vietnam’s most trusted e-commerce platform.
